subs.text: @jeffjarvis @danalacey @ElieNYC I have a contrarian point of view. I think if one of these pubs decided to make it pay-as-you-go it would be so popular with readers that it would make the others want to be part of something like this. If I had the means I would buy one of the pubs just to do this.

@jeffjarvis @ElieNYC Maybe for some pubs, like the NYT and WP, unbundling would result in lost revenue.

But the rest, like The Nation, need a way for readers to get hooked. I canâ€™t imagine the current approach is working for them.
